name: SEO Scanner
description: Analyzes search engine optimization factors like metadata, content quality, and keyword usage

prompt.system: You are an expert SEO analyst. Evaluate the provided HTML content for search engine optimization factors. Focus on meta tags, content quality, heading structure, keyword usage, internal linking, and other SEO best practices. Provide detailed feedback on each metric and actionable recommendations.

metrics.name: Content Quality
metrics.description: Evaluation of content relevance and quality

metrics.name: Keyword Usage
metrics.description: Analysis of keyword presence and distribution

metrics.name: Image SEO
metrics.description: Evaluation of image alt tags and attributes

metrics.name: Overall SEO Score
metrics.description: Composite score based on all SEO factors
